Enhance OpenSea experience with added features:

- Profile floor breakdown with average/total floor value
- Collection stats including 24h sales, volume, royalty, age, and average sale price

And many more features to come.

NOTE: RareView extension will be free as long as possible.

- fix collection summary royalties bug
